channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Atlas
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Atlas

item.title: CVE-2017-3150|2024-08-05T14:16:28.216Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20atlas
item.description: Apache Atlas versions 0.6.0-incubating and 0.7.0-incubating use cookies that could be accessible to client-side script.

item.title: CVE-2017-3153|2024-08-05T14:16:28.485Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20atlas
item.description: Apache Atlas versions 0.6.0-incubating and 0.7.0-incubating were found vulnerable to Reflected XSS in the search functionality.

item.title: CVE-2017-3154|2024-08-05T14:16:28.216Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20atlas
item.description: Error responses from Apache Atlas versions 0.6.0-incubating and 0.7.0-incubating included stack trace, exposing excessive information.

item.title: CVE-2017-3152|2024-08-05T14:16:28.241Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20atlas
item.description: Apache Atlas versions 0.6.0-incubating and 0.7.0-incubating were found vulnerable to DOM XSS in the edit-tag functionality.

item.title: CVE-2017-3151|2024-08-05T14:16:28.262Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20atlas
item.description: Apache Atlas versions 0.6.0-incubating and 0.7.0-incubating were found vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting in the edit-tag functionality.

item.title: CVE-2017-3155|2024-08-05T14:16:28.228Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20atlas
item.description: Apache Atlas versions 0.6.0-incubating and 0.7.0-incubating were found vulnerable to cross frame scripting.
